CustomField.formula: IF ( INCLUDES ( Product2.Treats__c , "Cold" ), "Cold;", null) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Product2.Treats__c , "Heat" ), "Heat;",null) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Product2.Treats__c , "Fatigue" ), "Fatigue;",null) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Product2.Treats__c , "Dizziness" ), "Dizziness;",null) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Product2.Treats__c , "Dryness" ), "Dryness;",null) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Product2.Treats__c , "Dampness" ), "Dampness;",null) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Product2.Treats__c , "Rash" ), "Rash;",null) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Product2.Treats__c , "Shedding" ), "Shedding;",null)
CustomField.label: Treats
